name: Echolocate (jade_duck)
description:
A platformer, but where you can only sense the platforms by echolocation. See if you can beat my best time of 46.3s!

Controls:

-Move left and right with arrow keys or A & D

-Jump with W or up arrow

-Echolocate with space

With assets from:

https://freesound.org/people/gogogonzoflow/sounds/570536/

https://freesound.org/people/ElanHickler/packs/2457/
